segments.text: Did you smell something ? It smells so great .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It must come from the bakery on the corner.They are baking cookies . Their cookies are very popular in town .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How come I never knew that ? Do they have a new baker or something ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think so . The bakery invited a famous baker from the USA . He is good at making cookies .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Let's go and get some cookies . I am hungry now .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Look at the swiss roll over there , they look delicious , too , I am thinking about buying one .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You can taste some before you buy it . They have food tasting at the counter .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I am starting loving this bakery now .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's one of my favorite bakeries .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You should have told me earlier . I am a cookie lover .
segments.speaker: S2
